definition: beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: I think I did quite a good job right here in the last three weeks during the U.S. Open Series.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我過去的三週在美網系列上確實打得很棒。

sentences.english: The result was emphatic victories at the Australian Open, Wimbledon and U.S. Open.
sentences.chinese: 最後結果是他贏得了澳網，溫布頓和美網。
